attributes.action: Reframe from paying any Emergency Money other than essenails to those who are UNINSURED
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last weeks we have seen some heart rending sights regarding flooding etc. Whilst having great sympathy with all those effected I do not feel that it is Governments job to recommpence for items destroyed. I have paid Insurance on my household contents etc, for over 40 years and feel strongly that those that CHOOSE not to take out insurance ought NOT  to be covered. If any persons can show that they have had Insurance refused then they should be entitled to benefit from any Emergency Fund, otherwise benefit is paid to those who chose not to take cover. If I had not had to pay the premiums over the last 40 years then I am sure that I also could have as 43" plazma TV and top of the range HiFi
Payments ought to be make to those that tried to cover their owm losses

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
